channel.title: Shark cage bug.
channel.description:
] status hostname: Half-Life 2 version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure map : bm_c2a3a at: 2883 x, 233 y, -543 z players : 1 (1 max)
So when i get into that cage and move around and around causing the cage to swing I kind of glitch onto the platform above the water when the cage falls. Avoiding the battle with that monster.

item.title: Shark cage bug.
item.dc:creator: DarkCamo
item.description:
Just giving a description won’t help anything. You need to take picture and or a video of how you did it. More preferably a video based on the description.

item.title: Shark cage bug.

item.description:

hostname: Half-Life 2
version : 1.0.1.0/14 4104 insecure
map : bm_c2a3a at: 2883 x, 233 y, -543 z
players : 1 (1 max)

So when i get into that cage and move around and around causing the cage to swing I kind of glitch onto the platform above the water when the cage falls.
Avoiding the battle with that monster.
